subtitle: This classic meal is easy to make and great for entertaining - or makes a Saturday night in a bit more special.

method.text: Heat half the oil and half the butter in a frying pan. Toss the steak in the seasoned flour until well coated. Add to the pan and fry for 5-8 min, stirring frequently, until meat is well browned. Add the brandy to the pan and set alight.
Heat the remaining oil and butter in a separate pan. Add the onion, garlic and mushrooms. Fry together for 3-5 min or until tender.
Stir the vegetables into the beef, along with the soured cream. Cook over a low heat for 2-3 min until just warmed through. Season to taste.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to pack instructions. Drain well.
Serve the stroganoff on a bed of noodles.

title: Brandied beef stroganoff
